entries.title: Secretary of State Marco Rubio was there with President Trump during the press conference on the Venezuela incursion and is front and center on the issue. Read more in today’s WSJ Politics newsletter.

Senators elected this fall will find that Social Security’s future insolvency is their problem

There are 35 Senate seats up for election in 2026, including two special elections. Democrats enter the midterm campaigns hoping history is on their side, but confronting a Senate map that is not.

The Trump administration says it wants details on America’s voters to ensure election integrity. Democrats and some Republicans question how the information will be used.
President Trump and top advisers had for months telegraphed plans to take down Nicolás Maduro. And yet, when it happened, Washington and Caracas were stunned by the attack’s ferocity and speed.
